attributes.action: Lower the age of Voting in the United Kingdom to 16 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the Students of Saint John Houghton Catholic School, Ilkeston, Derbyshire, would like to petition the Government to consider lowering the voting age within the United Kingdom.  As students, we play an active part in society and wish for our voice to be heard within the Government.  We are economically active at 16, we pay tax and National Insurance and, indeed, many 16 year olds are in full time employment.  We can fight for our country but we cannot vote.  We would like to see this change.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
